Privacy and Terms

Privacy Policy

At SWBS, we are committed to protecting your privacy. When you use our website, we collect personal information you provide, such as your name, phone number, and other details during registration or when contacting us for support. We also automatically collect certain data, such as your location (if you have granted permission). This information is used to provide and improve our services, respond to your inquiries, and personalize your experience within the App. We do not share your information with third parties except as necessary to operate our services or comply with legal requirements. Your privacy is important to us, and we take steps to ensure your information is kept secure.

Terms of Use

Welcome to SWBS. By accessing or using our website app, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the website. You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for ensuring that any information you provide is accurate and up to date. To access certain features of the App, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect and use your data. You agree not to use the website for any unlawful or prohibited activities, such as violating any laws, disrupting the functioning of the website, or uploading harmful content or malware. All content on the App, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of its respective owners and is protected by intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized use of this content is prohibited.
